Package com.intellij.ui

Class ScrollingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.ui.ScrollingUtil

  • public class ScrollingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for registering Keymap aware navigation actions for lists and tables
